title: [Banthal's Magic Shoppe]
[Banthal's Weaponry]
[Banthal's Outfitting]
[Banthal's Armory]
description: Beneath a ceiling of jagged crystals, a trio-bladed mounted vellum fan hangs on one of the iridescent crystal walls.  A narrow glass-topped table sits in one corner while an iron candelabra rests on the crystal floor.
